name: Google Contacts
description: Search, view, create, update, and delete Google Contacts via People API
author: PalmClaw Team

tools.name: contacts_search
tools.description: Search Google Contacts by name, email, or phone number. Returns matching contacts with name, email, phone, and organization.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10, max: 30)

tools.name: contacts_list
tools.description: List contacts from Google Contacts. Returns contacts with name, email, phone, and organization. Supports pagination via page_token.

max_results.description: Maximum number of contacts to return (default: 25, max: 100)

page_token.description: Page token from a previous response for pagination

tools.name: contacts_get
tools.description: Get full details of a specific contact including name, emails, phones, addresses, organization, biography, birthday, and URLs.

tools.name: contacts_create
tools.description: Create a new Google Contact with name, email, and phone number.

tools.name: contacts_update
tools.description: Update an existing Google Contact. Automatically fetches the current etag before updating. Only specified fields will be changed.

resource_name.description: The contact resource name to delete (e.g., 'people/c123456789')

tools.name: contacts_directory
tools.description: List directory contacts from a Google Workspace domain. Only available for Google Workspace accounts; consumer accounts will receive an appropriate error message.

max_results.description: Maximum number of directory contacts to return (default: 25, max: 100)
